text: The State Flag of Coahuila has a white background with the state arm of coat. ==Historical flags== File:Flag of Coahuila y Tejas.svg| Flag of Coahuila and Texas (1835-1840) File:Flag of the Republic of the Rio Grande.svg| Flag of Rio Grande Republic (1840) File:Bandera del estado de Coahuila.png| Flag of Frente Coahuilense (2009) ==Related pages== * List of Mexican flags Coahuila Category:Coahuila Coahuila
title: Flag of Coahuila
